title: Taking concrete action on more sustainable construction materials – Monash Lens - Monash Lens
summary: Associate Professor Sudharshan N. Raman and his team at Monash University Malaysia are developing innovative construction materials and processes using recycled and upcycled materials like coal bottom ash and industrial byproducts. Their research aims to reduce the environmental impact of the construction industry by promoting circular economy principles and resource efficiency. This includes minimizing clinker content in cement, exploring the use of recycled aggregates, and developing a multi-campus research node focused on circular construction.
